name: Gluttony (xcape)
description:
This is for the BTP game jam. It is my first ever entry for a game jam. 

Suggested theme was, 'Less is More'. This is an endless runner game where you have to eat in limits while dodging obstacles to survive and run from a dog. Basically it is eat less junk food, stay more healthy. 

Instructions:

-Press up to jump

-In air, Press down to jump down

-If you hit the obstacle from the front, you will shift back

-When in air, If you jump down on obstacle it will crush it, but it takes energy.

Hope the instructions are clear and you enjoy the game. 

Every single element in this game is made by me when the game jam went live, from poor graphics to poor audio. LOL. I tried my best!
